name: ARTIC Foundation
description: ARTIC is a blockchain-based Art Gallery Platform, which empowers its own NFT ecosystem to assetize diverse art masterpieces. The application of the blockchain serves as a core element to foster the reconsideration of the perception of artworks by providing tangible and intangible services that can lead to the exhibition of domestic and foreign artworks and further impact the activation of the exchanges with artists around the globe. The blockchain technology further promotes an active trading and convenience in quality artworks through the design and development of related software and contributes to the expansion of the base of advanced art culture.
